title: Summoner name in referral is blank?
body: In the Bring A Mate page in completed invitations one of them has no summoner name it is just blank and says lvl 1. I am pretty sure it is my friend codester3 who I know is higher than lvl 10. Can someone please tell me how I can fix it or get the IP and skin?

replies.body:
Hey BorisOZ,

It may take some time to update. However, if it does not end up updating after a reasonable amount of time, feel free to send a ticket to Riot Games Player Support:
______________________________
As this is an account-specific inquiry, we can't assist you much further on the boards. You'll need to [submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) regarding your issue. A few tips as you submit your request: 

1. Be sure to submit as much information in your initial ticket as possible. For obvious reasons, each Rioter request for more information will delay the resolution of the issue. 
2. Create an account on the Riot Games Support website. It'll save you a lot of time in the future and keep your requests organized and easier to find/access. 
3. Be respectful and polite in your correspondences with Riot Support. 

Best of luck!
